The <head> section of an HTML document contains metadata and other information about the HTML document, but it is not displayed on the actual webpage. It typically includes elements like the document title, links to stylesheets or scripts, character encoding, and more. Here’s an example of how the <head> section is structured:

item.title: Some Important Question And Its Solution for DBMS Exam
item.description: Some Important Question And Its Solution for DBMS Exam My Source ðŸ“– For Questions I`m using THIS Q1. What is Data Base Management System? Explain with its Applications. DBMS stands for Database Management System. It is a software system that enables users to create, store, organize, and manage vast amounts of data efficiently and effectively. DBMS provides an interface for interacting with databases and handles tasks such as data storage, retrieval, modification, and deletion.

item.title: How To Install Custom Rom In Oneplus 8

item.title: How To Unlock Bootloader Oneplus 8
item.description: How To Unlock Bootloader Oneplus 8 What You Need Fastboot & ADB Drivers To unlock the bootloader of your OnePlus 8, you need to follow the official procedure provided by OnePlus. Here are the general steps to unlock the bootloader: Backup your data: Unlocking the bootloader will erase all data on your device, so it’s crucial to back up any important files or data before proceeding. Enable Developer Options: Go to Settings > About Phone and tap on the “Build number” seven times to unlock Developer Options.
